entities.name: dore
entities.description: Dore is mentioned as someone who helped Harry out of a tight spot once. He is described as having access to information that others do not.

entities.name: molly
entities.description: Molly is mentioned as being upset with Dung for slipping off duty when he was supposed to be tailing Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as having a tight waistband due to eating three helpings of rhubarb crumble and custard.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley's jeans are mentioned as being too small for Harry.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as looking relaxed and repeating.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as yawning widely and having her nose back to normal.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as sitting cross-legged on the floor, rolling butterbeer corks for Crookshanks to chase.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is mentioned as being lured out from under the dresser by Ginny and chasing after butterbeer corks.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as pushing away his empty plate and disagreeing with Molly about Dung staying for dinner.

relationships.description: Molly disagrees with Dung's decision to slip off duty when he was supposed to be tailing Harry.
Harry is wearing Dudley's jeans, which are too small for him.
Tonks' nose has returned to normal.
